channel.title: The Monster Feet Variety Show
channel.description: A weekly sketch comedy show from Toronto, Canada.
channel.itunes:author: Carrington Vanston
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Canadian weekly sketch comedy show.
channel.itunes:summary: A Canadian weekly sketch comedy show that doesn't always play nicely with others.

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: August 29, 2005
item.description: For the week of August 29, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guests Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include an announcement by the pilot, a safety presentation, an Earth Day extra, and part 2 of our travel advice for tourists in Toronto.
item.dc:creator: Carrington Vanston
item.content:encoded: An announcement by the pilot, a safety presentation, an Earth Day extra, and part 2 of our travel advice for tourists in Toronto.
item.itunes:author: Carrington Vanston

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: August 22, 2005
item.description: For the week of August 22, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guests Colin Foster and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include an interactive book club, the Hollywood Relief Fund, and travel advice for tourists in Toronto.
item.dc:creator: Carrington Vanston

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: August 15, 2005
item.description: For the week of August 15, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include mail call for illiterate listeners, a nursery rhyme by L. Ron Mother Hubbard, a footwear proverb, and the Grizzly Bear PicNic.
item.dc:creator: Carrington Vanston

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: August 8, 2005
item.description: For the week of August 8, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include Charles Manson's haiku concepts, a stormy address from a pulpit, some more things you didn't know that you didn't know about movies, a random subliminal message, and a chance to dig some swinging cats.
item.dc:creator: Carrington Vanston

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: August 1, 2005
item.description: For the week of August 1, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include Hilary Clinton's press conference, a peek at the Christian science-monitor, an opinions disclaimer that gets nasty, a graduation speech, and a heli-skiing vacation surprise.
item.dc:creator: Carrington Vanston

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: July 25, 2005
item.description: For the week of July 25, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Colin Foster, Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include the Ballad of Tom Cruise, some things you didn't know that you didn't know about movies, and how prayer sounds to God.

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: July 18, 2005
item.description: For the week of July 18, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include news of the new Harry Potter book launch, the Weekly Quiz of the Week, and a call to Film Fone that goes horribly wrong.

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: July 11, 2005
item.description: For the week of July 11, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Colin Foster, Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include a public service announcement about spam and your penis, and a bunch of music trivia that you can pretend you already knew.

item.title: Monster Feet Variety Show: July 4, 2005
item.description: For the week of July 4, 2005, host Carrington Vanston is joined by guest announcers Linda Gagatsis and Tanya Smith. This week's skits include a presidential address from the future, a coach's halftime address to the team, the Weekly Quiz of the Week, and the Joke of the Day.
